comment._content: you're doing great job! History is my another hobby and looking at your pictures one gets an opportunity to see history at their very guts! It's more than books. thank you for your efforts.

comment._content:
Di Hobbes: We're happy to share our photos with you and all other viewers and Flickr members! That's the very point with old photos - to make them viewed - to learn from them about the past or "simply" to enjoy them. 
/Anna B.
